div.b: Sometimes programs need to do some special things which can’t be done without the permission of OS like reading from a file, writing to a file , getting any information from the hardware or requesting a space in memory.

switch.text: Sometimes programs need to do some special things which can’t be done...

div.b:
The OS recieves the system call then handled it by stop the user program
execution and the kernel get all the control to handle the user request.
